timeline.message: fixed timeline bug where box shrank when panning
Fix for scatter 3d throwing an exception where not all 3 attributes have been selected.

timeline.bodyText: Please use StringUtils.isEmpty(). @antares1470 did a sweeping change to the code base and did this conversion so for consistency and a little bit more readability please use this.
timeline.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText:
Actually use StringUtils.isBlank() as this will include the null check as well :)
It will simplify the boolean condition to
StringUtils.isBlank(xDimensionName) || StringUtils.isBlank(yDimensionName) || StringUtils.isBlank(zDimensionName)
replies.author: antares1470

timeline.message: Fix for scatter 3d throwing an exception where not all 3 attributes have been selected.
